mapper.select:
select m.ID id, m.loginName loginName, m.cellPhone cellPhone, m.status status, m.orgid organizationid, m.registTime registtime, m.userpercheck userpercheck, m.driverpercheck driverpercheck, m.companypercheck companypercheck, m.submittime submitDate, m.lastTime lastTime, m.sourceType sourceType, m.sex sex,f.*,v.* from member m LEFT JOIN member_info f ON f.memberId = m.ID LEFT JOIN wuliu_vehicle_driver v ON v.driverId = m.ID
m.ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select m.ID id, m.loginName loginName, m.cellPhone cellPhone, m.status status, m.orgid organizationid, m.registTime registtime, m.userpercheck userpercheck, m.driverpercheck driverpercheck, m.companypercheck companypercheck, m.submittime submitDate, m.lastTime lastTime, m.sourceType sourceType, m.sex sex, f.idcardimage idcardsImagePath, f.memberid infoid, f.driverimage driveImagePath, f.idcard identityCard, f.username userName, f.telphone telphone, f.companyname companyName, f.companycontact companyContact, f.companytel contactTel, f.companyAddress companyAddress, f.auditname auditName, f.audittime auditTime, f.auditresson rejectReason from member m LEFT JOIN member_info_record f ON f.memberId = m.ID AND f.submittime = m.submittime
m.ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select m.ID id, m.loginName loginName, m.cellPhone cellPhone, m.status status, m.orgid organizationid, m.registTime registtime, m.userpercheck userpercheck, m.driverpercheck driverpercheck, m.companypercheck companypercheck, m.submittime submitDate, m.lastTime lastTime, m.sourceType sourceType, m.sex sex,f.*,v.* from member m LEFT JOIN member_info f ON f.memberId = m.ID LEFT JOIN wuliu_vehicle_driver v ON v.driverId = m.ID
m.ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
